name: The Archers
description:
Game "Archers" - is a hardcore 2d time killer.

You need to defeat as many enemy stickman as you can by your bow before they kill you. The enemy stickmen is killed by two hits in the torso or one headshot. Hit apple and you restore one health point.

There is simple and intuitive operation in the game. For targeting and firing power simply drag the player, and then lower it to shoot.

I hope you will like this archery game. E-mail us your suggestions to improve the gameplay. Enjoy the game!
